appName: Cube Puzzle XR - with Tutorial and Timer

descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

displayName: Cube Puzzle XR - with Tutorial and Timer
display_name: Cube Puzzle XR - with Tutorial and Timer
display_long_description:
Enter Cube Puzzle XR — the next-gen cube puzzle experience in Mixed Reality for Quest 3, Quest 2, and Quest Pro.

Solve the cube in your own space with MR passthrough, or relax in full VR mode. Play your way: follow the new built-in step-by-step tutorial to learn solving, enjoy a calm zen mode, race against the timer HUD for speed challenges, or have fun with the playful AI Cat that reacts to your every move. Every grab, throw, and solve feels real — thanks to precise XR controls.

FEATURES:
• Solve a 3×3 Cube Puzzle in VR or MR
• NEW: Step-by-step tutorial — perfect for beginners
• Timer HUD for speedruns and challenges
• Playful AI Cat companion — curious, reactive, and fun
• Interactive toys and objects you can throw and play with
• Smooth, natural cube turns
• Optional chessboard for extra fun

COMING SOON:
• Multiplayer races with friends
• Daily challenges & leaderboards
• More interactive toys

Cube Puzzle XR is for everyone — from total beginners to puzzle speedrunners. Update regularly and be the first to enjoy new features in Mixed Reality.
